vishnu_stotras.name: Vishnu Sahasranama
vishnu_stotras.author: Sage Vyasa
vishnu_stotras.description: A list of the 1000 divine names of Lord Vishnu, chanted for spiritual protection, peace, and liberation.
vishnu_stotras.key_excerpt: शान्ताकारं भुजगशयनं पद्मनाभं सुरेशम् । विश्वाधारं गगनसदृशं मेघवर्णं शुभाङ्गम् ॥

sections.introduction: Dialogue between Bhishma and Yudhishthira on the supreme duty.

vishnu_stotras.name: Narayana Kavacham
vishnu_stotras.author: Sage Vishvarupa
vishnu_stotras.description: A powerful armor prayer invoking the protection of Lord Narayana on all sides of the body.
benefits: Protection from physical and spiritual harm

structure.body_protection: Protection for head, chest, arms, legs, senses

vishnu_stotras.name: Vishnu Stuti (Gajendra Moksham Prayer)
vishnu_stotras.speaker: Gajendra (Elephant King)
vishnu_stotras.description: The heartfelt prayer chanted by Gajendra to invoke Vishnu’s presence when caught by a crocodile.
vishnu_stotras.key_excerpt: ॐ नमो भगवते तस्मै यत एतच्चिदात्मकम्

vishnu_stotras.name: Mukunda Mala Stotram
vishnu_stotras.author: King Kulasekhara Alwar
vishnu_stotras.description: A devotional collection of verses praising Lord Krishna as Mukunda—the giver of liberation.

vishnu_stotras.name: Aditya Hridayam (Surya-Narayana Stotra)
vishnu_stotras.speaker: Sage Agastya to Lord Rama
vishnu_stotras.description: A powerful hymn invoking Surya-Narayana to destroy fear and grant victory.
vishnu_stotras.notes: Though dedicated to Surya, it praises the Vishnu aspect within Surya.

vishnu_stotras.name: Govinda Stotram
vishnu_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
vishnu_stotras.description: A reminder to remember Govinda—the supreme Lord—amid daily struggles.
vishnu_stotras.key_excerpt: भज गोविन्दं भज गोविन्दं गोविन्दं भज मूढमते ।

vishnu_stotras.name: Sri Hari Stotram
vishnu_stotras.author: Brahma
vishnu_stotras.description: A praise of Lord Hari describing his compassion, form and cosmic presence.
